mapper.select: select * from act_ru_task where ID_ in (select TASK_ID_ from act_ru_identitylink where TYPE_='candidate' and GROUP_ID_ in ( select WW_JS_BM from t_xtsz_yhjs where WW_YH_BM = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )) or ID_ in (select TASK_ID_ from act_ru_identitylink where TYPE_='participant' and USER_ID_ = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete from act_ru_variable where EXECUTION_ID_ = (select EXECUTION_ID_ from act_hi_taskinst where ID_ = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
delete from act_ru_execution where PROC_INST_ID_ = (select PROC_INST_ID_ from act_hi_taskinst where ID_ = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
delete from act_ru_identitylink where TASK_ID_ = (select ID_ from act_ru_task where PROC_INST_ID_ = (select PROC_INST_ID_ from act_hi_taskinst where ID_ = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
delete from act_ru_task where PROC_INST_ID_ = (select PROC_INST_ID_ from act_hi_taskinst where ID_ = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update act_ru_task t1,act_hi_taskinst t2 set t1.NAME_ = t2.NAME_,t1.PARENT_TASK_ID_=t2.PARENT_TASK_ID_,t1.PRIORITY_=t2.PRIORITY_, t1.DESCRIPTION_=t2.DESCRIPTION_ where t2.TASK_DEF_KEY_=#{rejectElemKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.PROC_DEF_ID_=t2.PROC_DEF_ID_ and t1.PROC_INST_ID_=t2.PROC_INST_ID_

update act_ru_identitylink t1,act_hi_identitylink t2 set t1.GROUP_ID_ = t2.GROUP_ID_,t1.TYPE_=t2.TYPE_ where t1.TASK_ID_ in (select ID_ from act_ru_task where PROC_INST_ID_ = (select PROC_INST_ID_ from act_hi_taskinst where ID_= #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) and t2.TASK_ID_=#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into act_ru_execution (ID_, REV_, PROC_INST_ID_, PROC_DEF_ID_, ACT_ID_, IS_ACTIVE_, IS_CONCURRENT_, IS_SCOPE_, IS_EVENT_SCOPE_, SUSPENSION_STATE_, CACHED_ENT_STATE_) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,#{proInsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{proDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rejectElemKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1,0,1,0,1,2)

insert into act_ru_task (ID_, REV_, EXECUTION_ID_, PROC_INST_ID_, PROC_DEF_ID_, NAME_, DESCRIPTION_, TASK_DEF_KEY_, ASSIGNEE_,PRIORITY_, CREATE_TIME_, SUSPENSION_STATE_) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,#{ruExecutionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{proInsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{proDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rejectElemKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{assignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(),1)

insert into act_ru_variable (ID_, REV_, TYPE_, NAME_, EXECUTION_ID_, PROC_INST_ID_,TEXT_) values(#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ruExecutionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proInsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{text,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into act_ru_identitylink (ID_, REV_, GROUP_ID_, TYPE_, USER_ID_, TASK_ID_) values(#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,#{gId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{uId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
